channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Humans& thinks coordination is the next frontier for AI, and they’re building a model to prove it
item.description: Humans&, a new startup founded by alumni of Anthropic, Meta, OpenAI, xAI, and Google DeepMind, is building the next generation of foundation models fo...

item.title: Microsoft 365 hit by outage, preventing access to emails and files
item.description: An hours-long outage is preventing Microsoft's enterprise customers from accessing their inboxes, files, and video meetings.

item.title: What Happens When a Chinese Battery Factory Comes to Town
item.description: Chinese firms are building battery plants from Europe to North America, promising jobs while prompting local concerns about the environment, politics,...

item.title: Substack launches a TV app
item.description: The move comes as Substack has been investing more heavily in video and livestreaming, as it looks to compete with platforms like YouTube and Patreon ...

item.title: The 28 Best Movies on Apple TV, WIRED’s Picks (January 2026)
item.description: F1: The Movie, CODA, and Highest 2 Lowest are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Apple TV this month.

item.title: Google DeepMind CEO is ‘surprised’ OpenAI is rushing forward with ads in ChatGPT
item.description: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis says the tech giant isn't pressuring him to insert ads into the AI chatbot experience.

item.title: Ring is adding a new content verification feature to videos
item.description: Ring says the new feature will identify if video edits have been made, even if they're minor.

item.title: Elon Musk Sure Made Lots of Predictions at Davos
item.description: Humanoid robots, space travel, the science of aging—Musk weighed in on all of it at this week’s World Economic Forum. But his predictions rarely work ...

item.title: How Claude Code Is Reshaping Software—and Anthropic
item.description: WIRED spoke with Boris Cherny, head of Claude Code, about how the viral coding tool is changing the way Anthropic works.

item.title: AI-Powered Disinformation Swarms Are Coming for Democracy
